metadata.description: The untold story of the Red Martian princess!  After learning of the legendary Gardens of Mars from her grandfather, Dejah Thoris, Princess of Helium, sets off on a dangerous scientific expedition to save her dying planet. But things don't go the way she planned when she encounters a mysterious Green Martian prisoner...  A prequel to Edgar Rice Burroughs' beloved book A Princess of Mars.
metadata.name: Dejah Thoris Vol. 4
